address: Xã Chiềng Lao, Huyện Mường La, Tỉnh Sơn La
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Chiềng Lao, Huyện Mường La, Tỉnh Sơn La"**

Okay, so I've been tasked with finding the new administrative unit for "Xã Chiềng Lao" in Sơn La province.  First things first, I confirmed that Sơn La province isn't undergoing any province-level mergers (per Resolution 60-NQ/TW).  That's good to know, but I need to dig deeper into the district and commune level changes.

The key resolution seems to be 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically regarding commune-level adjustments in Sơn La.  Line 21 creates a "xã Mường La," but that's not related to my target commune.  Crucially, Line 22 *explicitly* lists "Chiềng Lao" as one of the communes that *are* merging to form a *new* commune, which also gets the name "**xã Chiềng Lao**".

I also checked the list of new wards, which turned up an entry for "Xã Chiềng La", but that doesn't match the original, and I also discounted other suggested communes.

Based on this analysis, I'm confident in concluding that the old "Xã Chiềng Lao" has been merged with other communes, specifically Nậm Giôn and Hua Trai, to form a *new* "Xã Chiềng Lao". This is in agreement with my expertise in interpreting administrative boundary changes.

citation.header: 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Sơn La
citation.line: 22. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Nậm Giôn, Hua Trai và Chiềng Lao thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Chiềng Lao.
